getSubPlotNr(event)[source]¶

Get the nr of the subplot that has been clicked

Arguments: event – an event

Returns: A number or None if no subplot has been clicked

onEvent(event)[source]¶

Handler for all trapped events.

Arguments: event – a KeyEvent

startBlock()[source]¶

starts blocking for keypress event

stopBlock()[source]¶

stops blocking for keypress event

tv(img, min=None, max=None, cmap=None)[source]¶

main display routine: displays image with optional scaling

Parameters:
  • img – a numpy array OR a fits HDU
  • max= (min=,) – option scaling arguments
tvbox(x, y, size=None, color=None)[source]¶

displays a patch (box by default) on an image

Parameters:
  • x,y – center position of patch
  • size – (optional) patch size
  • color – (optional) patch color
tvclear()[source]¶

clears patches from image

tvmark()[source]¶

blocking input waits for key press in display and returns key and data pixel location of keypress :param none:

Returns:key pressed, x data position, y data position
